alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 12:31PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Archer and eastern Baylor Counties through 115 PM CST... At 1231 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Millers Creek Reservoir, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seymour, Holliday, Megargel, Mabelle, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Mankins, Westover, Lake Kickapoo and eastern Lake Kemp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
